title: RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > Overview > Description > RAK13003 IO Expansion Module Overview
content: The RAK13003 is an IO expansion module that can be mounted to IO slot of WisBlock Base board. It offers 16 bidirectional I/O ports by using MCP23017 IC from Microchip. The configuration of the module is via I2C interface and it supports both standard and fast I2C modes.
parent_content: The RAK13003 is an IO expansion module that can be mounted to IO slot of WisBlock Base board. It offers 16 bidirectional I/O ports by using MCP23017 IC from Microchip. The configuration of the module is via I2C interface and it supports both standard and fast I2C modes.

title: RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > Specifications > Overview > Mounting > RAK13003 Module Mounting on WisBlock Base Board
content:
The RAK13003 module can be mounted on the IO slots of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13003 on a WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Mounting
parent_content:
The RAK13003 module can be mounted on the IO slots of the WisBlock Base board. Figure 1 shows the mounting mechanism of the RAK13003 on a WisBlock Base board.  
> **Image:** RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Mounting

title: RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Chipset > RAK13003 IO Expansion Module: MCP23017 Device Addressing [TABLE]
content:
The RAK13003 IO Expansion Module uses MCP23017 from Microchip.  
| Vendor    | Part Number |
| --------- | ----------- |
| Microchip | MCP23017    |  
Figure 2 shows MCP23017 device addressing. Default A2, A1, and A0 are connected to ground. 7-Bits I2C address is 0x40.  
> **Image:** The MCP23017 device addressing
parent_content:

> **Image:** The MCP23017 device addressing

title: RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Datasheet > Specifications > Hardware > Pin Definition > RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Pinout [TABLE]
content:
The RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module comprises a standard expansion. The expansion allows the RAK13003 module to be mounted on a WisBlock Base board. The pin order of the connector and the pinout definition is shown in Figure 3.  
> **TIP:** NOTE
- **I2C**，**SPI** related pins, **RESET**，**IO5**，**IO6**，**3V3**, and **GND** are connected to this module.
- **IO5** and **IO6** are connected to interrupt pin.
- **SPI** not supported for RAK13003.
parent_content:

- **IO5** and **IO6** are connected to interrupt pin.
- **SPI** not supported for RAK13003.  
> **Image:** RAK13003 WisBlock IO Expansion Module Pinout
